General.Name: Daxin Materials Corp
General.Description: Daxin Materials Corporation provides engage in the research, development, production, and sale of LCD display and semiconductor related fine chemicals Taiwan. It offers semiconductor materials comprising laser release layers, temporary bonding adhesives, and photosensitive dielectrics; display materials, such as LCD, touch panel, and OLED/EPD materials; and anhydride monomers. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: Central Taiwan Science Park, Taichung, Taiwan, 40763
